Name: Magical Girl Survivors: Prologue
About the game: Magical Girl Survivors: Prologue is a bullet screen survival game in rougelike mode. FREE DEMO for Magical Girl Survivors. You play as a magical maiden, holding up for 15 minutes against endless orcs. Game Features [/] Three beautiful magic girls and a special costume to choose from (there will be more magic girls and costumes for the standard edition) Active and passive skills are no longer limited by slots, and you can even learn all active and passive skills! Fire, Thunder, Water, Blade, Dark 5 categories of more than 20 skills, different skills can buff each other! A variety of genres to choose from, blood rage build, thorn build and so on. Game mode Kill Orcs with magic to gain experience and upgrade dozens of active and passive skills in the 5 series of Fire, Power, Water, Blade and Darkness. There is interaction between different skill groups, and lower skills can also reinforce higher skills. Forbidden spells In the case of an orc siege where ordinary magic is not enough to break through, Magical maidens can use powerful forbidden spells, such as Mooncannon, Meteor Shower, and Blade Storm.
